headline: Cookies and Cream Brownies
description: If you love Oreo cookies, you'll love these cookies and cream brownies. They are easy to make and taste and look delicious.
name: Cookies and Cream Brownies
recipeIngredient: 32 chocolate sandwich cookies (such as Oreo®), divided
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9-inch square baking pan.
Mix sugar, flour, cocoa powder, salt, and baking powder together in a mixing bowl.
Whisk butter, eggs, and vanilla together in a separate bowl. Add butter mixture to the flour mixture and mix until well combined.
Pour 1/2 of the batter into the prepared baking pan and smooth out with a spatula. Add 16 OREO® cookies in an even layer (4 rows of 4 cookies), then spread the remaining 1/2 of the batter over top.
Bake in the preheated oven until edges are brown and center is set, 30 to 35 minutes.
Remove pan from the oven and set on a wire rack. Let brownies cool completely, at least 30 minutes.

Crush 12 of the remaining OREO® cookies. Place the whipped topping in a bowl and fold in the crushed cookies. Spread over the top of the brownies. Crush the remaining 4 cookies, then sprinkle over the top of the whipped cream mixture.
Keep refrigerated until you are ready to slice and serve.

review.reviewBody: This is delicious and it is simple to make.
IT was so GOOD my friends and my kids loved it as soon as it was made it was gone in seconds. will make this again for sure.
This is delicious! I’ll definitely make this again for my chocolate-loving friends.

I made this for a potluck and the whole pan was demolished! The brownie base of this dessert is the best brownie I've ever had. I'll probably make brownies with this recipe from here on. A solid layer of Oreos kinda scared me, so I just went with the crushed Oreos in the topping and it was plenty of cookie for me. Well done!
